name: Planex - GGJ 2019
description:
+++ Introduction

Welcome worker drone. PLAN-EX is the leading home world creation service for aliens without a planet. As an employee of PLAN-EX, you will be expected to create custom planet orders using our state-of-the-art constructor ship. Collect and drop elements on the planets core to shift the terrain in accordance with customer orders. Employees are reminded that terraforming elements are EXTREAMLY VOLITIAL and may cause chain tectonic events. *PLAN-EX is not responsible for loss of ship or planet. Failure to comply with company code will lead to a reduction in compensation. 

+++  Controls

Navigate the menu either with the controller stick or the arrow keys. Confirm a menu by pressing A-Button or .

Move your ship either with the controller stick or the left/right arrow keys. Collect elements by moving over them. Shoot them towards the planet by pressing A-Button or . Fire consumes Wood Wood drains Water Water extinguishes Fire Score points by creating planets (based on elements requested by aliens).

+++ Global Game Jam

Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/planex
